trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when there is a syntax error in XML parsing.
trans-unit.target: 當解析 XML 時發生語法錯誤，所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException> uses the default <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> implementation, which supports reference equality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException> 使用預設的<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>支援參考相等的實作。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>, see the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單<xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>，請參閱建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException" /> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設屬性，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: "Invalid syntax."
trans-unit.target: 「 無效的語法 」。

trans-unit.source: The line number of the XML stream where the XML syntax error was detected.
trans-unit.target: 偵測到 XML 語法錯誤的 XML 資料流行號。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException" /> class with the line number where the exception was detected.
trans-unit.target: 使用偵測到例外狀況的行號，來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The line number of an XML stream is updated whenever a newline character is detected.
trans-unit.target: 只要偵測到新行字元時，會更新 XML 資料流的行號。

trans-unit.source: Numbering begins with 1 for the first line.
trans-unit.target: 編號從 1 開始的第一行的 1。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: "Invalid syntax on line `lineNumber`."
trans-unit.target: 「 無效的語法，在一行上`lineNumber`。 」

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: The line number of the XML stream where the XML syntax error was detected.
trans-unit.target: 偵測到 XML 語法錯誤的 XML 資料流行號。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException" /> class with a specified error message and the line number where the exception was detected.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息和偵測到例外狀況的行號，來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The line number of an XML stream is updated whenever a newline character is detected.
trans-unit.target: 只要偵測到新行字元時，會更新 XML 資料流的行號。

trans-unit.source: Numbering begins with 1 for the first line.
trans-unit.target: 編號從 1 開始的第一行的 1。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: "Invalid syntax on line `lineNumber` - `message` "
trans-unit.target: 「 無效的語法，在一行上`lineNumber` - `message` "

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>inner</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>inner</c> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外狀況的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 內部例外狀況參考。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息字串。
